verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, that they <S%H5144>separate<s%> themselves from the holy <S%H6944>things<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and that they <S%H2490>profane<s%> not my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> in those things which they <S%H6942>hallow<s%> unto me: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

<S%H559>Say<s%> unto them, <S%H376>Whosoever<s%> he be of all your <S%H2233>seed<s%> among your <S%H1755>generations<s%>, that <S%H7126>goeth<s%> unto the holy <S%H6944>things<s%>, which the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6942>hallow<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, having his <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> upon him, that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from my <S%H6440>presence<s%>: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

What man <S%H376>soever<s%> of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> is a <S%H6879>leper<s%>, or hath a running <S%H2100>issue<s%>; he shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>things<s%>, until he be <S%H2891>clean<s%>. And whoso <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> any thing that is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> by the <S%H5315>dead<s%>, or a <S%H376>man<s%> whose <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H7902><s%> <S%H3318>goeth<s%> from him; running: Heb. running of the reins

Or <S%H376>whosoever<s%> <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> any creeping <S%H8318>thing<s%>, whereby he may be made <S%H2930>unclean<s%>, or a <S%H120>man<s%> of whom he may take <S%H2930>uncleanness<s%>, whatsoever <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> he hath;

The <S%H5315>soul<s%> which hath <S%H5060>touched<s%> any such shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until <S%H6153>even<s%>, and shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>things<s%>, <S%H518>unless<s%> he <S%H7364>wash<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> with <S%H4325>water<s%>.

And when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> is <S%H935>down<s%>, he shall be <S%H2891>clean<s%>, and shall <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>things<s%>; because it is his <S%H3899>food<s%>.
That which dieth of <S%H5038>itself<s%>, or is <S%H2966>torn<s%> with beasts, he shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> to <S%H2930>defile<s%> himself therewith: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

They shall therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> mine <S%H4931>ordinance<s%>, lest they <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H2399>sin<s%> for it, and <S%H4191>die<s%> therefore, if they <S%H2490>profane<s%> it: I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> do <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> them.

There shall no <S%H2114>stranger<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>thing<s%>: a <S%H8453>sojourner<s%> of the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, or an hired <S%H7916>servant<s%>, shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>thing<s%>.

But if the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7069>buy<s%> any <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H7075>with<s%> his <S%H3701>money<s%>, he shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of it, and he that is <S%H3211>born<s%> in his <S%H1004>house<s%>: they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of his <S%H3899>meat<s%>. with: Heb. with the purchase of his money

If the <S%H3548>priest's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> also be married unto a <S%H376>stranger<s%> <S%H2114><s%>, she may not <S%H398>eat<s%> of an <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>things<s%>. a stranger: Heb. a man a stranger

But if the <S%H3548>priest's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> be a <S%H490>widow<s%>, or <S%H1644>divorced<s%>, and have no <S%H2233>child<s%>, and is <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto her <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, as in her <S%H5271>youth<s%>, she shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of her <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H3899>meat<s%>: but there shall no <S%H2114>stranger<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof.

And if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>thing<s%> <S%H7684>unwittingly<s%>, then he shall <S%H3254>put<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part thereof unto it, and shall <S%H5414>give<s%> it unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%> with the holy <S%H6944>thing<s%>.
And they shall not <S%H2490>profane<s%> the holy <S%H6944>things<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which they <S%H7311>offer<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>;

Or suffer them to <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H819>trespass<s%>, when they <S%H398>eat<s%> their holy <S%H6944>things<s%>: for I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> do <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> them. suffer: or, lade themselves with the iniquity of trespass in their eating
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and unto all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, <S%H376>Whatsoever<s%> he be of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, or of the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that will <S%H7126>offer<s%> his <S%H7133>oblation<s%> for all his <S%H5088>vows<s%>, and for all his freewill <S%H5071>offerings<s%>, which they will <S%H7126>offer<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>;
Ye shall offer at your own <S%H7522>will<s%> a <S%H2145>male<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>, of the <S%H1241>beeves<s%>, of the <S%H3775>sheep<s%>, or of the <S%H5795>goats<s%>.
But whatsoever hath a <S%H3971>blemish<s%>, that shall ye not <S%H7126>offer<s%>: for it shall not be <S%H7522>acceptable<s%> for you.

And <S%H376>whosoever<s%> <S%H7126>offereth<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H6381>accomplish<s%> his <S%H5088>vow<s%>, or a freewill <S%H5071>offering<s%> in <S%H1241>beeves<s%> or <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, it shall be <S%H8549>perfect<s%> to be <S%H7522>accepted<s%>; there shall be no <S%H3971>blemish<s%> therein. sheep: or, goats

<S%H5788>Blind<s%>, or <S%H7665>broken<s%>, or <S%H2782>maimed<s%>, or having a <S%H2990>wen<s%>, or <S%H1618>scurvy<s%>, or <S%H3217>scabbed<s%>, ye shall not <S%H7126>offer<s%> these unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, nor <S%H5414>make<s%> an offering by <S%H801>fire<s%> of them upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Either a <S%H7794>bullock<s%> or a <S%H7716>lamb<s%> that hath any thing <S%H8311>superfluous<s%> or lacking in his <S%H7038>parts<s%>, that mayest thou <S%H6213>offer<s%> for a freewill <S%H5071>offering<s%>; but for a <S%H5088>vow<s%> it shall not be <S%H7521>accepted<s%>. lamb: or, kid

Ye shall not <S%H7126>offer<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that which is <S%H4600>bruised<s%>, or <S%H3807>crushed<s%>, or <S%H5423>broken<s%>, or <S%H3772>cut<s%>; neither shall ye <S%H6213>make<s%> any offering thereof in your <S%H776>land<s%>.

Neither from a <S%H5236>stranger's<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H1121><s%> shall ye <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of your <S%H430>God<s%> of any of these; because their <S%H4893>corruption<s%> is in them, and <S%H3971>blemishes<s%> be in them: they shall not be <S%H7521>accepted<s%> for you.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

When a <S%H7794>bullock<s%>, or a <S%H3775>sheep<s%>, or a <S%H5795>goat<s%>, is brought <S%H3205>forth<s%>, then it shall be <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> under the <S%H517>dam<s%>; and from the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H1973>thenceforth<s%> it shall be <S%H7521>accepted<s%> for an <S%H7133>offering<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
And whether it be <S%H7794>cow<s%> or <S%H7716>ewe<s%>, ye shall not <S%H7819>kill<s%> it and her <S%H1121>young<s%> both in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>. ewe: or, she goat
And when ye will <S%H2076>offer<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H2076>offer<s%> it at your own <S%H7522>will<s%>.
On the same <S%H3117>day<s%> it shall be eaten <S%H398>up<s%>; ye shall <S%H3498>leave<s%> none of it until the <S%H1242>morrow<s%>: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
Therefore shall ye <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> them: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Neither shall ye <S%H2490>profane<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>; but I will be <S%H6942>hallowed<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> which <S%H6942>hallow<s%> you,
That brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, to be your <S%H430>God<s%>: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
